verses.text: Give ear \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* words, O Lord; give thought \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* heart-searchings.

Let \w the|strong="H3068"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* cry come \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0561"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* King \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0561"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* make \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer.

\w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* come \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* morning, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* Lord; \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* morning \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* send \w my|strong="H3588"\w* prayer \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* keep watch.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6963"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* not \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* takes pleasure \w in|strong="H3068"\w* wrongdoing; \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* no evil \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* sons \w of|strong="H0410"\w* pride \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* place \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*; \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0859"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* hater \w of|strong="H0410"\w* all workers \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* send destruction \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* words \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w false|strong="H0205"\w*; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* cruel \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* deceit \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord.

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* come \w into|strong="H0376"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* house, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* full measure \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H0006"\w* worship, turning \w my|strong="H3068"\w* eyes \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* holy Temple.

\w Be|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* guide, \w O|strong="H1004"\w* \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w*, \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* ways \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* righteousness, \w because|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* those who \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*; make \w your|strong="H0935"\w* way straight \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* face.

\w For|strong="H4616"\w* no faith \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5148"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* words; \w their|strong="H3068"\w* inner part \w is|strong="H3068"\w* nothing \w but|strong="H1870"\w* evil; \w their|strong="H3068"\w* throat \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H1870"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* \w open|strong="H6440"\w* place \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* dead; \w smooth|strong="H3474"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* tongues.

Send \w them|strong="H7130"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w destruction|strong="H1942"\w*, O Lord; let \w their|strong="H3588"\w* evil designs \w be|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w cause|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* fall; let \w them|strong="H7130"\w* \w be|strong="H0369"\w* forced \w out|strong="H3559"\w* \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w all|strong="H6310"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* sins; \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w gone|strong="H0369"\w* against \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w authority|strong="H3559"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* let \w all|strong="H7230"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H0430"\w* put \w their|strong="H3588"\w* faith \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* glad \w with|strong="H0430"\w* cries \w of|strong="H0430"\w* joy \w at|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H7230"\w* times, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* let \w all|strong="H7230"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lovers \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* name \w be|strong="H0430"\w* glad \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, Lord, \w will|strong="H8034"\w* send \w a|strong="H5921"\w* blessing \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* upright \w man|strong="H3605"\w*; \w your|strong="H3605"\w* grace \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* round \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* strength.
